title: meta usage
content:
I am researching into the typeface Meta. I have found some examples of where meta has been used in companies, magazines, adverts, logos but I am struggling a bit. Does anybody know of any other examples of it being used? I would prefer it to be the sans serif one as I am aware the serif one has just been released.

Thanks!

 [‹ Help](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42963 "Go to previous forum topic") [Excel Help Required..... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42941 "Go to next forum topic")
author: beckybcn

comments.content:
Hi Becky,

[Mozilla](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.mozilla.org/) uses [FF Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_meta_bold/?sample_text=Firefox%20%26%20Thunderbird), and so does [Neues Museum Nürnberg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.nmn.de/) (both found at [Simon Zirkunow’s Flickr photos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/bluesmuse/tags/meta/).

Have you read the wiki entry: [FF Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/FF%252BMeta). Additional information about its origin can be found at [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Erik%252BSpiekermann)’s own blog, he put [an article from Baseline 7, 1986](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.spiekermann.com/iblog/C61720386/E150639911/index.html) online.

F

A search of Typophile will yield some more examples of Meta in use

[http://www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011238/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20meta "http://www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20meta")
